name: Capstone Project: VR Rhythm Game For Oculus Devices
name_original: Capstone Project: VR Rhythm Game For Oculus Devices
description:
The above video shows the progress that my team and I made in this project.

In our VR Rhythm game, each play through of a song is unique.  Instead the song is made up of unique patterns that can be used in different orders each playthrough.  Each song is representative of a combat in which the player must defeat the opponent before the song ends.  

The red blocks coming towards the player are the opponents attacks.  Breaking these blocks defends the player from the attacks.

Breaking the blue blocks generates energy for the player.  Once the player has enough energy the player can activate an attack state.

During the attack state white blocks will be added to the stream of blocks.  Breaking these will damage the opponent.

These things in conjunction force the player to make decisions in real time, rather than memorizing a whole song.  I believe this leads to a unique experience in the world of VR Rhythm games.
